thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 32 of 7354
thread.title: Henry

author: Henry
title: Henry
text: The sales representatives and customer service personnel were a pleasure to work with. Everyone was extremely polite, helpful, and efficient. I had a problem not being able to locate a store credit, but B&H solved the problem without any hassles. I must say I was very happy with the service I received from everyone at B&H. They definitely are professionals and helpful in every way. I give them 5+ stars for great service. Also, the ordering system was clear.
